aircraft.value: Dragonfly Scout - AC-3889-454 at Regional Depot-C

defect_observed.value: Hydraulic fluid contamination detected. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.

root_cause.value: Thermal cycling induced solder joint failure in electronic assembly

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Steering Control component. Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.

corrective_action.value: Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol. Date: 15/02/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Component inspection records verified. All quality parameters were within acceptable limits during manufacturing. Date: 16/02/2023 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational history analyzed. No abnormal usage patterns identified. Agree with proposed corrective actions. Date: 19/02/2023 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur. Date: 19/02/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 24/02/2023 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Safety Critical
b) Defect Observed: Hydraulic fluid contamination detected. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Thermal cycling induced solder joint failure in electronic assembly
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Steering Control component. Analysis of
operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Conduct fleet-wide inspection campaign
